channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News
channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: Alberta premier says loss of measles elimination status concerning, urges vigilance
item.description: Alberta Premier Danielle Smith says Canada recently losing its measles elimination status is concerning, but her government might not have many other options on the table to help get it back.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: ‘We’ve moved to Canada and are proud of it': Sour Puss liquor production moves from Minnesota to Quebec
item.description: The company has signed a deal to produce the liquor in Quebec after several provinces stopped stocking certain American-made alcohol products in response to U.S. trade actions.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Adds $1 Million to Accelerate Construction of Park Community Centre and Child-Care Facility in Brandon
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Latest case of animal abandonment in North Okanagan has advocates issuing a plea
item.description: While it's not known why exactly the chickens would be abandoned there, Runnalls said there are always other options to consider.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Provides $750,000 to Support Victims of Crime
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Calgary mayor proposes ban on raising other nations' flags at city hall
item.description: Farkas' urgent motion comes after a request to raise the State of Palestine’s flag outside Calgary city hall was approved back in September.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Invests $100,000 to Replace Brandon University Observatory Dome

item.title: Manitoba Government Delivers on Promises to Make Communities Safer

item.title: On Our Radar: Buddie turns its completely understandable stress into something beautiful
item.description: Guitar bands are back in Vancouver, and it’s beautiful.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: B.C. Attorney General 'deeply disturbed' by social media giant X's intimate image case
item.description: British Columbia's Attorney General says she's "deeply disturbed" that the social media company X has filed a legal challenge against an order to remove a non-consensual intimate image from the internet.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: WATCH: Global Okanagan News at 5:30 p.m. – Nov. 14
item.description: Watch the online news edition of Global Okanagan at 5:30 p.m.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Fall drought could spell water troubles for central Alberta regions, expert says
item.description: Large swaths of Alberta are experiencing extreme drought conditions. Some farmers are thinking twice about the amount of water they use heading into the winter months.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: How Ontario school boards decide when to cancel school buses
item.description: Many Ontario families will wake up this winter wondering if school busses are cancelled. But the decision to cancel them isn't as simple as you think.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: ‘The Librarians’ Traces the Battle of a Lifetime
item.description: As rightward forces campaign to pull books from library shelves, a gripping new documentary exposes what’s at stake.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: B.C. Lions quarterback Nathan Rourke named CFL's outstanding player, top Canadian
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Paulatuk, N.W.T., wants to fix drafty homes as part of its net-zero goal
item.description: The Paulatuk Energy Working Group has a goal of becoming carbon neutral. But everyone – from residents to those leading the project – agree making sure homes don’t waste that energy is a critical part of the target.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: New Brunswick mine added to major projects but opponents say it'll do more harm than good
item.description: In New Brunswick, opponents of a mining project that made Prime Minister Mark Carney's nation-building projects say the proposal could do more harm than good,
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Between Breaths dives into the life of a Newfoundland conservationist who loved people as much as whales
item.description: "What is your life, and what is your life to you in its final moments?"
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator
